description:
The application now displays properly (updating since my last review) on mobile 👌️

I would like to see options for manipulating images more (zoom, rotate, crop, fullscreen), and for chosing a tiling form factor, right now on mobile it's a long list of images, while, it does work, it's not exactly fast finding various images scrolling that way.
Finally a gallery app which is both beautiful and functional.
it would be great if the dev adds features like deleting,croping,rotating,enhanching photo (with non distructive mode) then it will easily replace gnome's default one.

CPU usage is too high
Cannot use scroll wheel to flip pages
Cannot zoom in or out
Video cannot be previewed
summary: CPU resource usage is too high
